queries.query: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `person` (`id` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,`name` VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL DEFAULT '',`lastname` VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', PRIMARY KEY (`id`))COLLATE='latin1_spanish_ci';

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `producto` (`id` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,`desc` VARCHAR(250) NOT NULL DEFAULT '',`precio` SMALLINT UNSIGNED NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,`stock` SMALLINT UNSIGNED NOT NULL DEFAULT 1,`name` VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL DEFAULT '',PRIMARY KEY (`id`))COLLATE='latin1_spanish_ci';

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `usuario` (`id` INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,`login` VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',`pass` VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',`edad` TINYINT UNSIGNED NOT NULL DEFAULT 14,PRIMARY KEY (`id`))COLLATE='latin1_spanish_ci'
